price: Este é um rompimento de Allah e de Seu Mensageiro com os que, dentre os idólatras, vós pactuastes.
arabic: بَرَآءَةٞ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦٓ إِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ عَٰهَدتُّم مِّنَ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: barāatun mina al-lahi warasūlihi ilā alladhīna ʿāhadttum mina al-mush'rikīna
